data.persona: I live in a large city, but I am leaving it behind.  There is too much noise in this city and I can't take it any more.  I seek to live in the peaceful and more quiet countryside.
data.description:
You are in the Decoration shop.
Outside the Temple is the decoration shop.  It is made of cobblestone and has flowers growing on the sides and back of it.  It has a large wooden sign hanging out front identifying it.  The shop is full of decorations for your home as well as for parties.
The royal family is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a hats.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the royal family so that I can greet them.
data.mid_motivation: I will talk to the royal family and ask for their advice on what decorations I should buy to decorate my country home.
data.long_motivation: I will move into my new home in the countryside and decorate it with elegance and class.
